name: StayHomeWhileVirusIsSpreading
description:
This is a mini game made during 2020/2/10 to 2020/2/18, to show our concern about the global pandemic and the need to stay home to ensure everyone's healthy living.

The game's mechanics is described in game, where you can click the Question button on the top-right of the corner in main menu.

When playing the game, there will be people who open their windows and shouting out, people who go outside but do not wear facial masks, people who are sick and need to go to hospital...... And your job is to get these questions done, close those people's windows, give people masks and send patients to hospital.

You will make use of the Q W E keys and your mouse to achieve different actions above. There will be special Items and Events that can occur while you're playing.

In the end, have fun with this little game and stay safe while the pandemic is still doing harms.
